name: Using Game States
nameNice: Padding out the Game Using Game States
descriptionShort: This section looks at creating a set of states and using score to make the game feel more polished.
description: This section looks at creating a start screen, a game over screen and keeping track of the player's score each game.

lessons.name: part1-1
lessons.description: Introduction to game states and their representation in Crafty.

lessons.name: part1-2
lessons.nameNice: Defining a Start and Game Scene
lessons.description: Here you will place your game code into its own game state and start the game by loading a start screen

lessons.name: part1-3
lessons.nameNice: Filling the Start Screen With Graphics
lessons.description: In this part of the lesson you will fill your start screen with some graphics and let the player launch the game from it!
